template.p: Odoo empowers cleaning service businesses (B2B and B2C) with efficient, integrated solutions designed to streamline operations and elevate service quality. With a unified platform that handles everything from customer inquiries and sales orders to on-site field tasks and invoicing, Odoo enables you to focus on delivering exceptional cleaning services while keeping your business agile and responsive.

ul.li: CRM: Manages customer inquiries and tracks leads with efficient follow-ups.
Sales: Creates quotations and sales orders, converting leads into transactions.
Field Service Tasks: Dispatches on-site cleaning tasks promptly upon order confirmation.
Invoicing: Automates bill generation and tracks payments for seamless financial management.
Recurring Service Visits: Schedules regular cleaning visits automatically for consistent service delivery.

template.p: The CRM module helps you capture and track customer inquiries, manage communications through chatter, and schedule follow-up tasks. This enables you to build and nurture strong customer relationships right from the first contact.

ul.li: Chatter: Use the chatter to communicate with team members, log notes, and keep a record of all updates related to the opportunity. Tag colleagues by typing @ followed by their name to send notifications.

Activities: Schedule activities directly within the CRM to ensure timely follow-ups. Activities are actions users take on a document, like making a call or organizing a meeting. Pending activities are visible above the message history in the chatter widget.

template.p: At any time, you can create from an opportunity a beautiful and tailor-made quotation that displays the price, the discount, the unit of measure, and the tax of each:

ul.li: Material that will be used to complete the task.
Service such as labor hours, traveling costs, etc.

template.p: Of course, feel free to create all the products you use often. This will save you time when preparing when preparing your next quotations.
Save time by directly sending the quotation by email to your customer. The personalized email provides:

ul.li: The quotation in PDF format.
A link to reach the online quotation from where the customer can confirm and sign it.

template.p: If the customer replies to the email, the answer is automatically logged in the chatter on the right of the screen. Thereby, all the discussions regarding the quotation, its updates, and its fine tuning are attached, and the history can be easily consulted by all the involved users.
Once confirmed, the quotation becomes a sales order. All quotations and sales orders are centralized in the Sales app.

div.p: If you want to push your quotation building much further and add all the power of Spreadsheet beneath any line of your Sales Orders, use the quote calculation feature.

template.p: The confirmation of the quotation automatically triggers the creation of dedicated tasks in the Field Service app! Each task is linked to its parent Sales Order.
Assign the tasks to the right responsible and easily check the progress in the Kanban view.

Our recurring task setting enables managing periodic cleaning appointments, reducing manual scheduling and fostering client loyalty. It only takes one click. From there on out, you can generate new quotations or sales orders in just another click.

Do you also provide subscriptions for your cleaning services? Products can be easily set to have an automatic recurrence, with an associated price. Alternatively, if you work without subscription, but need to create field service recurring task.

Use the Planning in the Field Service ‚Äãapp to organize the work of your employees. Define which project and when they have to work. Easily manage shift conflicts, workload, and replacements in case of leaves through the Gantt view of the app.
Record your employees' time spent on each task in the Timesheets tab of your field service tasks, and get an easy overview of all the timesheets in the Timesheets app.
Invoicing automates invoice creation and management, and integrates effortlessly with the rest of Odoo.
